definitions.text: material consisting of seed coverings and small pieces of stem or leaves that have been separated from the seeds
a slender or elongated structure that supports a plant or fungus or a plant part or plant organ
a hunt for game carried on by following it stealthily or waiting in ambush
the act of following prey stealthily
follow stealthily or recur constantly and spontaneously to
examples: the ghost of her mother haunted her

definitions.text: go through (an area) in search of prey
